name: MegaChicken
description:
My entry to Rusty Jam #2.

The game is portable and features a pet. There's not really much in the way of triangles, unless you count mesh rendering.

Synopsis

You are MegaChicken. You awaken to find yourself 6 feet tall, intelligent and ready to hit things. There's a cauldron next to you, which may explain why you have suddenly gained chicken super-powers.

You are joined by your friend Henry, an adorable golden retriever.  Together, you talk to chickens and battle monsters in your quest for the golden egg. If you find the egg, you win the game.

Controls

You can move with the cursor keys, or WASD. SPACE interacts with whatever object you are currently facing (hay/grain heals you). J jumps.

You will automatically bash any hostile creature that approaches you.

Defeating enemies increases both your health and your size.

Links

You can play the WASM version online: https://bfnightly.bracketproductions.com/megachicken/

Source code is here: https://github.com/thebracket/rusty-jam-2
